actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) is the attached 'room3' script on GameObject 829909756. Animator doorAnim=fileID 1865011923; AudioSource winton=fileID 829909759. Initial expected state: laser1=false, laser2=false, doorOpen=false. This test ensures the door does NOT open when the first laser is set, then immediately deactivated, then a single laser is set again (Update should not call doorAnim.Play or winton.Play because laser2 is never true).

MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) 'room3' should open the door when both lasers are set. Expect in Update: doorOpen transitions to true, Animator (fileID=1865011923) plays state 'DoorOpen', and AudioSource (fileID=829909759) plays.

After the door is opened once, verify idempotence: calling SetLaser again on MonoBehaviour id=829909757 does not re-trigger Animator.Play('DoorOpen') or AudioSource.Play() because of '!doorOpen' guard in Update.
MonoBehaviour id=829909760 (guid=e9bec2616c6206946b1a15b3faa151c2) is the attached 'QuitGame' script on GameObject 829909756. Triggering ExitGame should call Application.Quit().

actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) is the attached 'room3' script on GameObject 829909756 per scene meta. Animator doorAnim=fileID 1865011923; AudioSource winton=fileID 829909759. Initial: laser1=false, laser2=false, doorOpen=false. Calling DesactivateLaser with laser1=false should do nothing and must not open the door.

MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) is the attached 'room3' script on GameObject 829909756. Animator doorAnim=fileID 1865011923; AudioSource winton=fileID 829909759. This test ensures the door does NOT open when the first laser is set, then deactivated, then only a single laser is set again (Update should not call doorAnim.Play or winton.Play because both lasers are not true simultaneously).

MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) should open the door when both lasers are set. Expect during Update: doorOpen transitions from false to true, Animator (fileID=1865011923) plays state 'DoorOpen', and AudioSource (fileID=829909759) plays.

Post-condition of previous test: doorOpen is already true. Verify idempotence: calling SetLaser again on MonoBehaviour id=829909757 does not re-trigger Animator.Play('DoorOpen') or AudioSource.Play() due to '!doorOpen' guard in Update.

taskUnits.condition: Child of 'Room 3'. MonoBehaviour guid=fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b corresponds to LaserBeamSender attached to this Sender (from scene meta). roomData in LaserBeamSender is expected to reference 'room3' MonoBehaviour id=829909757 on 'Room 3'. Rotate away so the Raycast in Update does NOT hit a GameObject tagged 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). Since isConnected is initially true, LaserBeamSender should set isConnected=false and call roomData.SetLaser().

Rotate toward a Receiver so the Raycast in LaserBeamSender.Update hits a GameObject tagged 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). With isConnected=false from prior step, this should set isConnected=true and invoke roomData.DesactivateLaser() on 'room3' (id=829909757).

Child of 'Room 3'. MonoBehaviour guid=fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b corresponds to LaserBeamSender attached to 'Sender (1)' (from scene meta). roomData is expected to reference 'room3' MonoBehaviour id=829909757 on 'Room 3'. Rotate away so the Raycast does NOT hit a 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). With isConnected initially true, expect isConnected=false and roomData.SetLaser().

Rotate toward a Receiver so the Raycast in LaserBeamSender.Update hits a GameObject tagged 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). With isConnected=false from prior step, expect isConnected=true and a call to roomData.DesactivateLaser() on 'room3' (id=829909757).

actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4) is the attached 'room3' script on GameObject 829909756 (per BatScene.unity meta). Serialized refs: doorAnim=fileID 1865011923, winton=AudioSource fileID 829909759. Initial: laser1=false, laser2=false, doorOpen=false. Calling DesactivateLaser with laser1=false should be a no-op and must not play Animator or AudioSource.
room3 MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4). Ensure door does NOT open when a single laser is set, deactivated, then set again (both lasers not true simultaneously).

room3 MonoBehaviour id=829909757 (guid=1b862119da8709d4e9055a3c441a7bb4): When both lasers are set, Update should set doorOpen=true, Animator (fileID=1865011923) plays 'DoorOpen', and AudioSource (fileID=829909759) plays.
Post-condition: doorOpen already true. Idempotence check for room3 id=829909757: further SetLaser calls must not retrigger Animator.Play('DoorOpen') or AudioSource.Play() due to '!doorOpen' guard.

taskUnits.condition: Child of 'Room 3'. MonoBehaviour guid=fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b corresponds to LaserBeamSender attached to this Sender (meta shows script on prefab). roomData is expected to reference 'room3' MonoBehaviour id=829909757. Rotate away so Raycast does NOT hit objects tagged 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). Since isConnected starts true, expect branch: set isConnected=false and call roomData.SetLaser().

Rotate toward a Receiver so the Raycast hits tag 'Receiver' (IDs 307824527 or 1764688939). With isConnected=false, expect branch: set isConnected=true and call roomData.DesactivateLaser() on 'room3' id=829909757.

Child of 'Room 3'. MonoBehaviour guid=fe963bb06f1c63d4fa78e077220a709b corresponds to LaserBeamSender attached to 'Sender (1)'. Rotate away from Receivers; with isConnected initially true, expect set isConnected=false and call roomData.SetLaser() on room3 id=829909757.
Rotate toward a Receiver; with isConnected=false from prior step, expect set isConnected=true and call roomData.DesactivateLaser() on room3 id=829909757.
Integration path using in-scene behavior: face Sender away from Receivers to invoke LaserBeamSender.Update -> room3.SetLaser() once.

Integration path: face Sender (1) away from Receivers to invoke a second room3.SetLaser(). Expect room3.Update to detect laser1 && laser2, set doorOpen=true, and play Animator 'DoorOpen' and AudioSource once (doorAnim=fileID 1865011923, winton=fileID 829909759).

actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour guid=2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006 in scene meta corresponds to SnapToTrigger attached to this cube ('Cube Interactable', Transform stripped id=2008732144). Call Snap(Vector3 trigger_pos) to disable XRGrabInteractable/XRGeneralGrabTransformer, set position to trigger_pos with +0.4f Y offset, zero rotation, freeze Rigidbody, and set isSnapped=true (then Update should rotate object around local Y).

MonoBehaviour guid=2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006 in scene meta corresponds to SnapToTrigger attached to this cube ('Cube Interactable', Transform stripped id=1096850852). Call Snap(Vector3 trigger_pos) expecting same behavior as above; verify repeated Snap usage across multiple instances.
MonoBehaviour id=829909760 (guid=e9bec2616c6206946b1a15b3faa151c2) is the attached 'QuitGame' script on GameObject 829909756. Trigger ExitGame() should call Application.Quit().
